mapper.insert: insert into message (message_seq, receiver_m_id, receiver_admin_code, sender_m_id, sender_admin_code, content, blacklist_seq) values (seq_message.nextval, #{receiver_m_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver_admin_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_m_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_admin_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content}, #{blacklist_seq,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select blacklist_seq from message where blacklist_seq is not null

select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select m.*, a.* from message m, admin a where receiver_m_id = #{m_id} and m.sender_admin_code is not null and m.sender_admin_code = a.admin_code order by opendate nulls first, senddate desc) b) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select * from message where receiver_m_id = #{m_id} and sender_m_id is not null order by opendate nulls first, senddate desc) b) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from message where sender_m_id = #{m_id}
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from message where receiver_m_id = #{m_id} order by senddate desc) a) where rnum < 4
